data.system_settings: Moto G3 - Android 6.0.1 and Moto G5S Plus Android 8.0.0
data.expected_result: Keyboard should open if we touch the keyboard icon
data.short_description: Keyboard button not working in text area
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel - Press Plus icon in the Text area in left - Select keyboard button - Sometime it will open, if not slide to the right - And it can happen if its is done vice versa
